name: microagents-arrow
title: Microagents Arrow
description: Directional affordance for hopping between microagents.

name: microagents-link
title: Microagents Link
description: Action link for routing to a linked microagent.

name: microagents-send
title: Microagents Send
description: Prompt input for dispatching work to agents.

name: microagents-orchestration-left
title: Microagents Orchestration Left
description: Chevron control for stepping back in orchestration flows.

name: microagents-orchestration-right
title: Microagents Orchestration Right
description: Chevron control for stepping forward in orchestration flows.

name: microagents-agent-curve
title: Microagents Agent Curve
description: Decorative curve for representing agent-to-agent runs.

name: microagents-user-curve
title: Microagents User Curve
description: Decorative curve for representing user to agent hand-offs.

name: microagents-button
title: Microagents Button
description: Primary microagents call-to-action with gradient treatment.

name: microagents-button-alt
title: Microagents Button Alt
description: Secondary microagents action for softer confirmation steps.

name: microagents-panel
title: Microagents Panel
description: Composite panel bundling orchestration controls, link cards, and prompt send.
